oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: You're A Beautiful Place To Be - Eddy Arnold performance - 1978-10-11
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance of You're A Beautiful Place To Be, written by Van Stevenson, produced by Bob Montgomery, arranged by Bergen White, recorded on October 11, 1978, and performed by Eddy Arnold.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Eddy Arnold
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Eddy Arnold performs "You're A Beautiful Place To Be"
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Arnold, Eddy, 1918-2008; White, Bergen; Montgomery, Bob, 1937-
